RenÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â© Descartes thought your body could exist through mechanical means alone. This incorporated digestion, bloodstream circulation, muscle movement plus some thinking processes. The above mentioned is really a amazing combination of advanced thought in front of his some time and unproved, unsound speculation which today could be known as unscientific.
